data.title: All About Brooke Shields Kids: Two Daughters Rowan and Grier Henchy
data.meta_description: Brooke Shields and her husband Chris Henchy have two daughters. Here's everything about Brooke Shields kids: Rowan Francis Henchy and Grier Hammond Henchy.
data.text:
Brooke Shields Kids: Brooke Shields and her husband Chris Henchy have two daughters. The couple got married on April 4, 2001. They had their first daughter, Rowan Francis Henchy, in 2003. Their second daughter, Grier Hammond Henchy, was born in 2006.

Brooke Shields is an American actress and model who gained fame as a child star in the late 1970s and early 1980s. She was born on May 31, 1965, in New York City. Shields first came into the public eye at the age of 12 with her controversial role in the film “Pretty Baby” (1978), in which she played a child prostitute in New Orleans at the turn of the 20th century.

Brooke Shields, known for her roles in movies like Pretty Baby and The Blue Lagoon and modeling for Calvin Klein, has shared her concerns about her daughters growing up with social media.

Here’s everything you want to know about Brooke Shields Kids: Two Daughters Rowan and Grier Henchy.

All About Brooke Shields Kids

Brooke Shields has two daughters with her husband Chris Henchy. Their first daughter, Rowan Francis Henchy, was born in 2003. Their second daughter, Grier Hammond Henchy, was born in 2006.

Keep scrolling to know more about Brooke Shields kids.

Rowan Francis Henchy, 21

Rowan Francis Henchy, born on May 15, 2003, is the elder daughter of actress and model Brooke Shields and television writer and producer Chris Henchy. Standing at an impressive height, much like her mother, Rowan has been a familiar face alongside Brooke during various public appearances, reflecting the close bond they share.

Rowan has grown up in the spotlight to some extent, given her mother’s fame. She lives with her family, which has been based in various locations, including Greenwich Village in New York City. The family is known to value their privacy, but they occasionally step into the public eye for events and causes important to them.

Brooke Shields has been very open about her struggles with postpartum depression following Rowan’s birth, which has made Rowan’s early life a significant part of her mother’s advocacy for mental health awareness. Brooke’s candid sharing of her experiences has helped demystify and destigmatize discussions around maternal mental health.

As for her personal pursuits, Rowan has shown interest in fashion and performing arts, echoing her mother’s passions. She made headlines in June 2021 when she wore her mother’s red Golden Globes dress from 1998 to her prom, showcasing a blend of personal style and familial nostalgia.

Grier Hammond Henchy, 18

Grier Hammond Henchy, born on April 18, 2006, is the younger daughter of actress and model Brooke Shields and television writer and producer Chris Henchy. Standing tall with a height that complements her mother’s statuesque figure, Grier has made several public appearances alongside Brooke, reflecting their close-knit family dynamic.

Grier lives with her family in Greenwich Village, New York City, a vibrant and artistic neighborhood that complements their creative backgrounds. Being in such a culturally rich environment has undoubtedly influenced Grier’s interests and aspirations. Much like her older sister, Rowan, Grier has been exposed to the public eye from a young age, often attending events and red carpets with her mother.

Brooke Shields has frequently highlighted her journey through motherhood with Grier, noting the marked improvement in her mental health during her second postpartum experience. This positive shift has allowed Brooke to advocate even more passionately for maternal mental health, using her experiences with both daughters to help other mothers facing similar challenges.

In recent years, Grier has shown a growing interest in fashion and the arts, hinting at a possible future in the entertainment industry. Her poised and confident appearances at various events have drawn media attention, showcasing her as a potential rising star. Additionally, Grier’s fashion choices often mirror her mother’s classic and elegant style, suggesting a shared passion for fashion.

Brooke Shield Relationships

Brooke Shields has had a few notable relationships throughout her life, both personal and professional. Here are the key relationships:

Andre Agassi: Brooke Shields was married to former professional tennis player Andre Agassi from 1997 to 1999. Their relationship received considerable public attention, and in his autobiography, Agassi discussed the marriage, describing it as a period of personal turmoil for both of them.

Chris Henchy: After her divorce from Agassi, Brooke Shields married television writer and producer Chris Henchy in 2001. They have two daughters together, Rowan and Grier, and have maintained a stable and enduring relationship.

Conclusion

In conclusion, Brooke Shields, a prominent actress and model, has successfully balanced her professional career with her role as a mother to two daughters, Rowan and Grier Henchy. Married to Chris Henchy since 2001, Brooke’s family life has often been in the spotlight, showcasing her dedication to her children and her personal growth. As a public figure, Brooke continues to inspire many with her advocacy for women’s health and wellness, making her not only a celebrated star but also a role model for mothers and women worldwide.

All About Brooke Shields Kids: Two Daughters Rowan and Grier Henchy – FAQs

What are names of Brooke Shields kids?

Brooke Shields has two daughters with her husband Chris Henchy. Their first daughter, Rowan Francis Henchy, was born in 2003. Their second daughter, Grier Hammond Henchy, was born in 2006.

How many biological children does Brooke Shields have?

Brooke Shields and Chris Henchy are the proud parents of two daughters. After the couple tied the knot on April 4, 2001, Shields and Henchy welcomed their first daughter, Rowan Francis Henchy, in 2003.

Is Brooke Shields still married to Chris?

Yes, Brooke Shields is still married to Chris Henchy. They tied the knot in 2001 and have been together ever since. They share two daughters, Rowan and Grier, and continue to be a close-knit family.

Who are Brooke Shields’ ex-husbands?

From 1997 to 1999, she was married to tennis player Andre Agassi; the couple had been together since 1993. Following her divorce from Agassi, she married television writer Chris Henchy in 2001, after they had met through common friends in 1999.

What is Brooke Shields illness?

Shields has said that her tonic-clonic seizure was caused by drinking too much water, resulting in low blood sodium levels. This condition, known as hyponatraemia, has significant consequences for the brain – most notably a swelling of brain cells as their water content increases.
